introduction_text:
We are excited to invite you to participate in our HR Survey. This survey is designed to gather your honest feedback about our workplace, policies, and overall employee experience. Your input is extremely valuable and will help us identify strengths, address challenges, and create initiatives that support both your professional growth and our organizational goals.


The survey is confidential, and we encourage you to share your thoughts openly. By participating, you are helping us build a better, more supportive workplace for everyone.


Thank you in advance for your time and valuable insights!
name: survey
success_message:
Thank you for taking the time to complete our HR Survey. Your feedback is highly valuable and will help us better understand your needs, improve workplace practices, and build a stronger environment for everyone.

We truly appreciate your participation and honesty in sharing your thoughts. Your input plays a key role in shaping the future of our Ministry

Malo
title: Survey

web_form_fields.label: Q1. How would you rate your experience with the HR services?
web_form_fields.options:
Very satisfied
Satisfied
Neither Satisfied nor Dissatisfied
Dissatisfied
Very Dissatisfied

web_form_fields.label: Q3. How well do our services meet your needs?
web_form_fields.options:
Extremely well
Very well
Somewhat well
Not so well
Not at all well

web_form_fields.label: Q4. Did the HR service resolve your inquiry to your satisfaction?
web_form_fields.options:
Very satisfied
Satisfied
Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied
Dissatisfied
Very dissatisfied

web_form_fields.label: Q5. Did HR team keep you informed about the status of your inquiries or issues?
Q6. How would you rate the quality of the HR Services?
web_form_fields.options:
Very high quality
High quality
Neither high nor low quality
Low quality
Very low quality

web_form_fields.label: Q7. How long have you been an employee of the Ministry of Infrastructure?
web_form_fields.options:
Less than a year
Less than six months
Six months to a year
1 - 2 years
3 or more years

web_form_fields.label: Q8. On a scale of 1 to 5 how would you rate the responsiveness of our HR service?
Q9. Overall, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the Ministry of Infrastructure?
web_form_fields.options:
Very satisfied
Somewhat satisfied
Neither satisfied nor dissatisfied
Somewhat dissatisfied
Very dissatisfied

web_form_fields.label: Q10. Do you have any other comments, questions, or concerns?
